sections.heading: # How to Contribute
sections.prompt: Explain the contribution workflow (4-5 paragraphs): (1) Overview of contribution types welcomed, (2) Fork and clone steps, (3) Branch naming convention, (4) Commit message format, (5) PR process. Be specific and procedural. Include exact commands.

sections.heading: ## Development Setup
sections.prompt: Step-by-step development environment setup (5-6 paragraphs): (1) Prerequisites with versions, (2) Installation commands in order, (3) Running tests, (4) Code formatting tools, (5) Pre-commit hooks if used, (6) Common troubleshooting. Focus on common path, note platform differences if critical.

sections.heading: ## Testing Your Changes
sections.prompt: How to test changes before submitting (3-4 paragraphs): (1) Running test suite, (2) Adding new tests, (3) Manual testing recommendations, (4) CI checks that will run. Include commands and expected output.

sections.heading: ## Code Standards
sections.prompt: Code quality expectations (3-4 paragraphs): (1) Code style (formatter/linter used), (2) Documentation requirements, (3) Test coverage expectations, (4) Review process. Be clear about must-haves vs nice-to-haves.
